Package library.collision

Class Arbiter

java.lang.Object
library.collision.Arbiter
public class Arbiter
extends java.lang.Object
Creates manifolds to detect collisions and apply forces to them. Discrete in nature and only evaluates pairs of bodies in a single manifold.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    int contactCount  
    Vectors2D contactNormal  
    Vectors2D[] contacts
    Array to save the contact points of the objects body's in world space.
    double restitution

  • Constructor Details

    • Arbiter

      public Arbiter​(Body a, Body b)
      Main constructor for arbiter that takes two bodies to be evaluated. Sets static and dynamic friction constants here.
      Parameters:
      a - First body of arbiter.
      b - Second body of arbiter.

    • isPointInside

      public static boolean isPointInside​(Body b, Vectors2D startPoint)
      Method to check if point is inside a body in world space.
      Parameters:
      b - Body to check against.
      startPoint - Vector point to check if its inside the first body.
      Returns:
      boolean value whether the point is inside the first body.

    • narrowPhase

      public void narrowPhase()
      Conducts a narrow phase detection and creates a contact manifold.

    • findAxisOfMinPenetration

      public void findAxisOfMinPenetration​(library.collision.AxisData data, Polygon A, Polygon B)
      Finds the incident face of polygon A in object space relative to polygons B position.
      Parameters:
      data - Data obtained from earlier penetration test.
      A - Polygon A to test.
      B - Polygon B to test.

    • penetrationResolution

      public void penetrationResolution()
      Resolves any penetrations that are left overlapping between shapes. This can be cause due to integration errors of the solvers integration method. Based on linear projection to move the shapes away from each other based on a correction constant and scaled relative to the inverse mass of the objects.

    • solve

      public void solve()
      Solves the current contact manifold and applies impulses based on any contacts found.
